data.title: How To Watch the Atlanta Falcons 2024 Season
data.meta_description: Will Kirk Cousins be the missing piece for the Falcons? Here’s what you need to know about every 2024–2025 Atlanta Falcons football game.
data.text:
One day, Atlanta Falcons fans will know peace! But at the moment, the Falcons’ vibes heading into the 2024 NFL season are predictably unpredictable. Between breaking in a new coach and starting quarterback with Raheem Morris and $100-million-dollar-man Kirk Cousins, the Falcons’ record next season is anyone’s guess.

Can Kirk Cousins be the missing piece for a Falcons offense that’s long underperformed despite being stacked with talent? How long will it take until everyone gets sick of Michael Penix Jr. in-season speculation? Here’s what you need to know to watch the 2024–2025 Atlanta Falcons.

If you have a cable or streaming TV subscription, you’ll be able to watch most Falcons games, but the number of games you’ll get depends on your location because of the NFL’s TV blackout policies.

Want to watch Atlanta Falcons games for free next season? The Mohu Leaf 50 is an over-the-air (OTA) antenna that can pick up broadcast networks like CBS and FOX for free. Read our OTA antenna guide for more of our top antenna picks.

Prefer to stream Atlanta Falcons games? Nearly every live TV streaming service offers free trials—visit our guide to streaming service free trials to learn more.

*Amazon.com price as of 5/7/24 11:00 a.m. CT. Product prices and availability are accurate as of the date/time indicated and are subject to change. Any price and availability information displayed on Amazon.com at the time of purchase will apply to the purchase of this product. CableTV.com utilizes paid Amazon links.

Certain content that appears on this site comes from Amazon. This content is provided “as is” and is subject to change or removal at any time.
